segments.text: I notice the water gushing from the sink, soaking everything.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman is oblivious, her foot in the puddle without a flinch.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This mess is disgusting, with water streaming down the cabinets.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The floor is turning into a slippery hazard, unclean and unsafe.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy climbing the stool while the kitchen floods is irresponsible.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Reaching into the cookie jar like that, crumbs will be everywhere soon.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl just standing there, waiting, adds to the disorder.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Open cabinets and stacked dishes invite more clutter and breakage.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The curtains tied back let in light, but can't hide the filth building up.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can't stand how the overflow is ruining the nice wooden doors.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This whole setup is a recipe for a dirty, chaotic cleanup.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The tidy garden outside makes the inside look even worse.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Someone should turn off that faucet before it's a total disaster.
segments.speaker: PAR
